entries.description: When upgrading from older KKP versions, additional flag '--migrate-nginx-ingress' is required to perform upgrade of nginx-ingress-controller. Ingress will be briefly unavailable during this process.
Configuration for cert-manager will now be included under key 'cert-manager' in values.yaml file (changed from 'certManager')

Is it now possible to configure multiple backup destinations, therefore the current implementation of backup buckets will be deprecated soon. Migrate the configuration to a destination to keep using it in the future. It is reachable via the UI 'Admin Panel' -> 'Backup Destinations'
The chart will no longer configure ClusterIssuers. Refer to the documentation of cert-manager for configuration guide.
Set the default Service Accounts automountServiceAccountToken property to false for all KKP provided namespaces and kube-system
The old Docker repository at 'quay.io/kubermatic/api' will not receive new images anymore, please use 'quay.io/kubermatic/kubermatic' (CE) or 'quay.io/kubermatic/kubermatic-ee' (EE) instead
The '-dynamic-datacenters' flag has now been removed as a flag. Support for handling a 'datacenters.yaml' has been removed also.
Added support for the external cluster management
Added experimental support for the Operating System Manager
Added support for AWS AssumeRole when creating the AWS cluster
Added support for alerts grouping to the Alertmanager
Added support for the Cilium CNI with the integrated Hubble addon
Added support for the CNI type 'none' to allow users to manage their user cluster CNI on their own
Added support for the Konnectivity
Added support for the 'EventRateLimit' admission plugin
Extended the audit policy settings. User can now choose from one of the pre-defined configurations: metadata, minimal, recommended, custom.
Redesigned the cluster details information
Fixed an issue with EtcdBackupConfigs from multiple clusters having the same ID, which was causing a bug in the UI
Fixed missing validation for GCE datacenter zone_suffixes
Fixed high resource usage during metering startup
Fixed disabling metering not having any effect
